tagline.title: BALI SWING AND KINTAMANI TOUR IS A COMBINATION TOUR TO ENJOY JUNGLE SWING AND CONTINUE VISIT KINTAMANI WITH VIEW MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO
tagline.text: BALI SWING AND KINTAMANI TOUR IS A COMBINATION TOUR TO ENJOY JUNGLE SWING AND CONTINUE VISIT KINTAMANI WITH VIEW MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO
tagline.html: BALI SWING AND KINTAMANI TOUR IS A COMBINATION TOUR TO ENJOY JUNGLE SWING AND CONTINUE VISIT KINTAMANI WITH VIEW MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO

description.text: Bali Swing and Kintamani Tour is combination tour package that we created for you to enjoy jungle swing with amazing panorama view and then continue the trip to visit kintamani village with view mount batur volcano and visit other interesting site that feature in this amazing combination trip. First trip is to visit Bali Swing for enjoy the swing and take picture in many beautiful spot in this location, after that you will enjoy lunch Indonesian food, after lunch finish the trip continue to visit kintamani village at penelokan for see the view of mount batur volcano and lake batur from this place. After that we visit tegalalang rice terrace is beautiful rice terrace and then continue the trip to visit last site is Tirta Empul Temple is holy spring temple at tampak siring village, after that we drive you back to your hotel with bring amazing experience feature in this Bali Swing and Kintamani Tour. Below is short description of the combination Bali Swing and Kintamani Tour.
description.html: Bali Swing and Kintamani Tour is combination tour package that we created for you to enjoy jungle swing with amazing panorama view and then continue the trip to visit kintamani village with view mount batur volcano and visit other interesting site that feature in this amazing combination trip. Below is short description of the combination Bali Swing and Kintamani Tour.

title.title: Bali Swing Tour | Bali Swing and Kintamani Tour

image.title: Bali Swing and Kintamani Tour | Bali Swing Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Swing Tour is an adventure activity that we created for those of you who want to enjoy swings on the island of Bali with very beautiful scenery in the forest, really the sensation of a tour that is different from the others. Swing in Bali is an activity that has just been introduced, but because of the enthusiasm of the tourists who want to try this activity making swing activities famous among domestic and foreign tourists. Enjoy the sensation of swing activity in jungle with amazing view and beautiful scenery, take picture with beautiful scenery in this place

title.title: Kintamani Village for Mount Batur Volcano and Lake Batur View | Bali Swing and Kintamani Tour | Bali Golden Tour
title.text: Kintamani Village for Mount Batur Volcano and Lake Batur View
title.html: Kintamani Village for Mount Batur Volcano and Lake Batur View

image.title: Bali Swing and Kintamani Tour | Kintamani Village for Mount Batur Volcano and Lake Batur View | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Kintamani Village is a name of countryside located in the hill and the beautiful panorama surround it. We can see beautiful panorama from Kintamani Village to overview the active volcano of Batur Mount and wide Lake of Batur in a valley. It is situated in the plateau area with cool weather surround it. When we stand up at Kintamani, we will be able to see the rural area which is close to the lake. Kintamani is the object of mountain tourism is very unique and stunning, with cool air condition in the daytime and cold at night. We can watch stunning natural scenery of Penelokan, a combination of Mount Batur and the expanse of black rock with Lake Batur and on a blue caldera.

title.title: Tegalalang Rice Terrace | Bali Swing and Kintamani Tour

image.title: Bali Swing and Kintamani Tour | Tegalalang Rice Terrace | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tegalalang Rice Terrace is tourism object for enjoy the beautiful rice terrace view in Ubud, is popular site for see rice terrace view in ubud village, and sometimes here you can see farmers working in the fields. Ubud Tegalalang Rice Terrace is one of the tourist icon in Ubud Bali. The Ubud rice terrace is designed very beautiful with exquisite hollowing rice field and precisely located on the hill bank. In this place, you will see the Balinese farmer do their rice field in oblique area complete with its system irrigation. Is amazing experience to see the spectacular view or rice terrace in this place.
description.html: Tegalalang Rice Terrace is tourism object for enjoy the beautiful rice terrace view in Ubud, is popular site for see rice terrace view in ubud village, and sometimes here you can see farmers working in the fields. title.title: Bali Swing and Kintamani Tour | Tirta Empul Temple (Holy Spring Temple at Tampak Siring)
title.text: Tirta Empul Temple (Holy Spring Temple at Tampak Siring)
title.html: Tirta Empul Temple (Holy Spring Temple at Tampak Siring)

image.title: Bali Swing and Kintamani Tour | Tirta Empul Temple (Holy Spring Temple at Tampak Siring)| Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tirta Empul Temple is built around the sacred spring at Tampak Siring. For more than a thousand years, Balinese worshipers have been drawn to Tirta Empul Temple whose sacred spring is said to have been created by Indra and to have curative properties. The tradition continues almost unchanged at the temple today. Over 1000 years old, the temple and its two bathing places have been used by the people for good health and prosperity because of the spring water's curative powers. But the main attraction at Tirta Empul Temple is a long rectangular pool carved of stone, filled with koi and fed by the sacred spring via 12 fountains.
description.html: Tirta Empul Temple is built around the sacred spring at Tampak Siring. price.title: Bali Swing and Kintamani Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Swing and Kintamani Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,400,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 900,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 800,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 750,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 700,000/person

Note : Get special price for group booking

Bali Swing and Kintamani Tour Price Include :

  • Private Car with Good A/C
  • Professional English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol and Parking Fee
  • Swing at Bali Swing
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Entrance Ticket at Tourism Site
  • Insurance Coverage during Bali Swing
  • Mineral Water

content.event: Enjoy Bali Swing Tour
Visit Kintamani for View Mount Batur Volcano
Visit Tegalalang Rice Terrace
Visit Tirta Empul Temple

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
